context: I recently saw the The Greatest Showman (2017) and loved it. Do you have any recommendations for musicals?
Sure! Did you see Moulin Rouge! (2001) ?
Oh, I've always wanted to see that, but have never got around to it... thanks!
Sure. You should also check out Cabaret (1972)
I also like movies set in the past, so it will be perfect for me. Would you recommend anything else?
Historical films or musicals... I saw Darkest Hour (2017) not so long ago and that was fantastic. Although you can't beat The Great Escape (1963) for a good war movie :)
I haven't seen that yet. Birdman of Alcatraz (1962) is a great escape movie, too! Check it out if you haven't
Oh I haven't seen it. The Rock (1996) is one of my guilty pleasures.
resp: Yes! Along with Con Air (1997). Those two are like a guilty pleasure double feature.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?
I'm always up for a thrilling and adventurous movie with a good dose of humor. Do you have any recommendations that fit the bill?
context.feelings: I love discovering new and unexpected films. It's always a pleasant surprise to find a movie that covers thrilling action, exciting adventure, and humor all at once. I hope the recommender has some unique recommendations for me.

context.content: I recommend "Fanboys (2009)" for a thrilling and adventurous movie with a good dose of humor.
Can you tell me more about "Fanboys (2009)"? I'd like to know what makes it thrilling, adventurous, and humorous.
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by this unexpected recommendation. I hope it's a good mix of thrilling action, exciting adventure, and humor. Let me ask for more details about "Fanboys (2009)."

context.content: "Fanboys (2009)" is a comedy film about a group of friends who embark on a road trip to break into George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch and steal a rough cut of "Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace" before its release. The movie is filled with adventure as the friends encounter various obstacles on their journey. It also has a good dose of humor as the friends navigate their way through geek culture and fanboy antics.
That sounds like a wild and entertaining adventure! I'm definitely up for watching "Fanboys (2009)". Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by this recommendation. "Fanboys (2009)" sounds like a fun and adventurous movie with a good mix of humor. I'm intrigued by the idea of a road trip to steal a rough cut of "Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace." It seems to cover all the genres I enjoy. I think the recommender did a great job understanding my preferences.

simulator_dialog.resp: Yes! Along with Con Air (1997). Those two are like a guilty pleasure double feature.
